title: An Interview with Pat Vines: The Shrine of Remembrance
creator_credit: Pat Vines and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: After Pat Vines returns from the war as a Commander of the Australian Navy, one of her senior navy officers recommends her to the Shrine of Remembrance Trustees, which she joins. She tells of her time as a Trustee for the Shrine.
